sn56.3:1.1: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atitamaddhanam kulaputta samma agarasma anagariyam pabbajimsu, sabbe te catunnam ariyasaccanam yathabhutam abhisamayaya.
sn56.3:1.2: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anagatamaddhanam kulaputta samma agarasma anagariyam pabbajissanti, sabbe te catunnam ariyasaccanam yathabhutam abhisamayaya.
sn56.3:1.3: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi kulaputta samma agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, sabbe te catunnam ariyasaccanam yathabhutam abhisamayaya.
sn56.3:2.2: Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa dukkhasamudayassa ariyasaccassa dukkhanirodhassa ariyasaccassa dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadaya ariyasaccassa.
sn56.3:2.3: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atitamaddhanam kulaputta samma agarasma anagariyam pabbajimsu …pe…
sn56.3:2.5: pabbajanti, sabbe te imesamyeva catunnam ariyasaccanam yathabhutam abhisamayaya.
sn56.3:3.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti yogo karaniyo, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti yogo karaniyo, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
